about_the_game:
DLC-exclusive attachment items. Contains 6 different item designs.

Beast Ears x2
Karja's Side Tail x2
Brother Style: Adol
Brother Style: Karja
Wall-Breaker Style: Adol
Wild Child Style: Karja

*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After receiving items, change costumes via [Equipment] -> [Costumes] in the main menu.
